nodes.text: Vana Sage was a female Human pilot and mercenary, who hindered the Trade Federation around the time of the Invasion of Naboo.

Sage left her home planet of Alderaan at fifteen to become a starfighter pilot. She served for a time with the Naboo Royal Security Forces, but left in disgust after her attempts to get the Naboo to increase their weak defenses were rebuffed. As she grew older, Sage became a mercenary and took a job as a "troubleshooter" for the Trade Federation, testing the abilities of new Trade Federation equipment. It was around this time that she contracted a rogue Xi Char Engineer to create the Guardian Mantis. She was also successful in obtaining the bomber of the Feeorin pirate, Nym.

While testing the Scarab craft, she intercepted an incriminating transmission sent to the Trade Federation. The federation then attempted to have her terminated. She soon teamed up with Bravo Pilot Rhys Dallows and Nym to stop the Federation's invasion of Naboo.

Following the battle, Sage accepted a pardon from the Galactic Senate and a position in the Royal Naboo Security Forces. In 24 BBY, at the request of Queen Padmé Amidala, she put together a compilation of information on Nym to be sent to Jedi Master Adi Gallia.

Two years later, Sage reunited with Nym in time to assist the Lok Revenants reclaim their base on Lok from Trade Federation forces under Cavik Toth's command. Following that battle, Sage departed to track down Reti, last seen fleeing the bounty hunter Jango Fett to regions unknown.
Vana Sage was voiced by Lisa Fuson in Star Wars: Starfighter and Star Wars: Jedi Starfighter.
